tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneticMutations(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(20),
  mutation_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE experiment (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT, mutation_id INT, mutation_type TEXT);
CREATE TABLE researcher (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name TEXT, organization TEXT);
CREATE TABLE mutation (mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mutation_description TEXT, mutation_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
	r_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	institution VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
	e_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	experiment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	experiment_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Mutations (
	m_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	mutation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	mutation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MutationsData (
	md_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	m_id INT,
	e_id INT,
	mutation_frequency FLOAT,
	FOREIGN KEY (m_id) REFERENCES Mutations(m_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (e_id) REFERENCES Experiments(e_id)
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(100),
    experiment_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    description TEXT
);
